name: Sneaker Rotate
description:
Simple game about Rotating pieces of the image to recive image of a Sneakers. If you're a hypebeast, sneakerhead or just want to chillout, You have to try this game out!

Version 1.0:
- 10 images/levels
- Menu and End screen
- Simple soundtrack

In Development:
- Next 10 levels
- Timer and level number on side
- Tutorial
- Description to every photo
- Better Image quality
